message: Are you ready to take your law firm to new heights and unlock its full potential? You are invited to a free webinar from Justia designed to equip solo lawyers and small law firm leaders with the critical business skills not taught in law school that are necessary to thrive in the legal industry.
Join Kimberly T. Lee, attorney and founder of the Desert Law Group on Friday, August 11 at 2:00 p.m. ET/11:00 a.m. PT for Great Life, Great Practice: Four Cornerstones of Law Firm Success.
bottomline: Seats are limited and registration is available on a first come, first served basis.
